title: China, US ambassadors meet DPM Dar; review bilateral ties
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 28 (APP): Ambassador of China Jiang Zaidong on Friday called on the Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar here.
Reaffirming Pakistan-China All-weather Strategic Cooperative Partnership, the two sides expressed the resolve to implement the bilateral consensus reached during Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharifâ€™s visit to China, a Foreign Office press release said.
Both sides also resolved to further strengthening of Pakistan-China friendship and up-gradation of the China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC).
Meanwhile, Ambassador of the United States in Islamabad Donald Blome separately met Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar.
The two sides reviewed the latest developments in bilateral relations and discussed ways to move the relationship forward.
